attributes.action: Ask George Bush to return land stolen from the Native American Indians and stop drilling near Edgemont
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Lakota tribe suffer hardship as do other tribes of Native American Indians.More land is being taken away and these Native American's have little rights. Our goverment has supported George Bush whilst the USA have violated the human rights of these people for many years.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
